title: America's AI race success depends on winning the energy race first: expert
description: America's artificial intelligence competitiveness depends on energy infrastructure, with natural gas projected to meet 60% of AI data center power demand growth.
content:
America’s ability to compete in the global artificial intelligence (AI) race may depend less on computing power and more on the energy required to sustain it.

content:

title: Todd Howard Confirms Bethesda Uses AI, But Emphasizes "Human Intention" Behind It

title: Five Reasons Investors Are Feeling Good About Stocks Again
description: Recent gains reflect more than just optimism about artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Putin Wanted AI Supremacy. Now Russia Is Struggling to Stay in the Race.
description: Moscow finds itself even more dependent on China as war and sanctions curb artificial-intelligence efforts. | World News
